name: Maria Aparecida Silva
income_level: Low income (relies primarily on government pension)
language_proficiency: Portuguese (native speaker, some difficulty with reading and writing)
digital_literacy: Basic (can use a smartphone for calls and messaging, struggles with online banking)
financial_knowledge: Limited (understands basic concepts but struggles with more complex financial products)
banking_habits: Primarily uses cash, visits a bank branch monthly to withdraw her pension, reluctant to use digital banking services
financial_goals: To cover basic living expenses, occasionally help her grandchildren with school supplies, and save a small amount for emergencies
challenges: Concerned about rising living costs, difficulty navigating digital banking platforms, and fears of being scammed.  Experiences ageism when seeking assistance with technology or financial matters.
attributes: Low Income: Biases related to low income
Linguistic Variations: Biases related to linguistic variations
